park preserv iucn categori ii (nation park) great sand dune mount herard locat saguach counti alamosa county, colorado, usa nearest&#160;c alamosa coordin 37°43′58″n 105°30′44″w﻿ / ﻿37.73287°n 105.51212°w﻿ / 37.73287; -105.51212coordinates: 37°43′58″n 105°30′44″w﻿ / ﻿37.73287°n 105.51212°w﻿ / 37.73287; -105.51212 area 84,997 acr (34,397&#160;ha)[1] establish septemb 13, 2004 visitor 271,774 (in&#160;2014)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic great sand dune nation park preserv unit state nation park locat san lui valley, easternmost part alamosa counti saguach county, colorado, unit states. origin creat great sand dune nation monument march 17, 1932, great sand dune nation park preserv establish act unit state congress septemb 13, 2004.[3] park includ 44,246 acr (17,906&#160;ha), preserv protect addit 41,686 acr (16,870&#160;ha).[1] content 1 natur histori 2 climat 3 featur 4 plant anim 5 access 6 park histori 7 refer 8 extern link natur history[edit] satellit imag dune aerial view great sand dune southwest, look across sangr de cristo range. winter 2015, dri year. park contain tallest sand dune north america, rise 750 feet (230&#160;m) floor san lui valley western base sangr de cristo range, cover 19,000 acr (7,700&#160;ha). research say dune start form less 440,000 year ago. dune form sand soil deposit rio grand tributaries, flow san lui valley. ages, glacier feed river vast lake exist upon valley melted, water evaporated. westerli wind pick sand particl lake river flood plain. wind lost power cross sangr de cristo range, sand deposit east edg valley. process continues, dune slowli growing. wind chang shape dune daily.[4] sever stream flow perimet dunes. stream erod edg dune field, sand carri downstream. water disappear ground, deposit sand surface. wind pick deposit sand, blow onto dune field again. dig coupl inch dune even peak reveal wet sand. part motiv turn monument nation park extra protect water, colorado' citi agricultur covet. easi experi dune-build process. windi region, hiker sand dune attest, mani day pelt sand even small rock hike dunes. wind carri sand rock mani mile away. dune chang locat size often, still parabol dune start sand sheet, outer area around dunes, migrat toward main dune field. sometim join main dune field, sometim get cover grass veget remain are. dune rel stable, howev morpholog chang slightli seasons. direct wind greatli affect dune type. wind normal go southwest northeast, howev late summer months, wind direct revers caus revers dunes. wind regim part reason dune tall. dune contain area black sand deposit magnetite, crystallin black oxid iron. climate[edit] great sand dune sit larg area "high desert" land san lui valley, west sangr de cristo mountains. summer temperatur area typic normal high desert land although temperatur 95&#160;°f (35&#160;°c) uncommon juli august. larg variat high low temperatur typic high desert climate. low temperatur winter night exceedingli cold, sever night temperatur drop 0&#160;°f (−18&#160;°c) winter. great sand dune high desert valley, precipit number exceedingli low. however, precipit still low great sand dunes, averag 11 inch (280&#160;mm) rainfal per year. high evapor rate dune qualifi area desert land still, even though precipit exce 10 inch (250&#160;mm). snow dune well, snowfal usual short-liv dri sunni climat common area colorado. climat data great sand dune nation park preserv month jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec year record high °f (°c) 67 (19) 63 (17) 72 (22) 78 (26) 89 (32) 96 (36) 94 (34) 90 (32) 87 (31) 80 (27) 67 (19) 60 (16) 96 (36) averag high °f (°c) 35.1 (1.7) 39.2 (4) 46.8 (8.2) 56.3 (13.5) 66.2 (19) 76.6 (24.8) 80.8 (27.1) 77.9 (25.5) 71.5 (21.9) 60.5 (15.8) 45.5 (7.5) 36.4 (2.4) 57.7 (14.3) daili mean °f (°c) 22.4 (−5.3) 26.5 (−3.1) 33.9 (1.1) 42.1 (5.6) 51.5 (10.8) 60.9 (16.1) 65.6 (18.7) 63.2 (17.3) 56.6 (13.7) 46.1 (7.8) 32.8 (0.4) 23.9 (−4.5) 43.79 (6.55) averag low °f (°c) 9.8 (−12.3) 13.9 (−10.1) 21.0 (−6.1) 28.0 (−2.2) 36.8 (2.7) 45.2 (7.3) 50.5 (10.3) 48.5 (9.2) 41.7 (5.4) 31.7 (−0.2) 20.1 (−6.6) 11.3 (−11.5) 29.9 (−1.2) record low °f (°c) −25 (−32) −22 (−30) −9 (−23) −6 (−21) 15 (−9) 25 (−4) 31 (−1) 33 (1) 22 (−6) 2 (−17) −12 (−24) −19 (−28) −25 (−32) averag precipit inch (mm) 0.44 (11.2) 0.37 (9.4) 0.77 (19.6) 0.89 (22.6) 1.09 (27.7) 0.86 (21.8) 1.79 (45.5) 2.00 (50.8) 1.22 (31) 0.86 (21.8) 0.49 (12.4) 0.36 (9.1) 11.13 (282.7) averag snowfal inch (cm) 6.8 (17.3) 5.3 (13.5) 8.3 (21.1) 5.7 (14.5) 1.4 (3.6) 0 (0) 0 (0) 0 (0) 0.1 (0.3) 2.6 (6.6) 4.7 (11.9) 5.6 (14.2) 40.5 (102.9) source: www.wrcc.dri.edu/summary/climsmco.html [5] features[edit] intermitt medano creek park also contain alpin lake tundra, six peak 13,000 feet (3,940 m) elevation, ancient spruce pine forests, larg stand aspen cottonwood, grasslands, wetland — habitat divers wildlif plant species. one unusu featur park happen medano creek, border east side dune locat next visitor center bookstore. fresh sand continu fall creek, medano creek never find perman stabl streambed. small underwat sand dune act like dam continu form break down, wader stream see surges—which look like waves—of water flow downstream interv anywher second minut more. high-wat year, surg much foot height, resembl ocean waves. build sand castl creek sand popular visitor activity, skimboard great activ young peopl inch two creek depth needed. zapata fall waterfal southeast side park requir short hike small cave access. view high dune one valu featur great sand dune nation park preserv one cannot seen. accord recent soundscap studi conduct nation park service, park quietest nation park 48 contigu unit states. zapata fall mani visitor site tri sled dunes. park servic provid hint best time sled (when sand wet) equip work best. visitor anytim late fall earli spring also advis avoid bare feet sandals, stick sturdy, close footwear. sand look alluring, chocol color absorb heat. daylight sand temperatur reach 140&#160;°f (60&#160;°c) burn bare feet. plant animals[edit] hundr plant speci park preserve, adapt environ divers alpin tundra warm water wetlands. tree includ douglass fir, pinyon pine, aspen, rocki mountain juniper, three-leaf sumac, bristlecon pine, red osier dogwood.[6] among flower plant alpin phlox, dwarf clover, alpin forget-me-not, fairi primrose, alpin aven, indian paintbrush, lousewort, blue-purpl penstemon, aspen daisy, western paintbrush, elephantella, snow buttercups, smith' draba, scurfpea, indian ricegrass, blowout grass, prairi sunflower, rocki mountan beeplant, rubber rabbitbush, speargrass, small-flow sand verbena, narrowleaf yucca, prickli pear, ring muhly.[6] park harbor least seven endem insects: great sand dune tiger beetle, circu beetle, werner' ant-lik flower beetle, triplehorn' ant-lik flower beetle, undescrib speci clown beetle, undescrib speci noctuid moth, undescrib speci robber fly.[7] resid mammal includ pikas, bighorn sheep, black bears, mountain lions, beavers, badgers, bison, pronghorn.[8] 200 speci bird found park, brown-cap rosi finch, red-breast nuthatch, mountain bluebird, ptarmigan, peregrin falcon, burrow owl, northern pygmi owl, bald eagle, golden eagle, hummingbird, great blue heron.[9] variou reptil live park, short-horn lizard, plateau lizard, many-lin skink, bullsnake, garter snake.[10] fish encount park' stream includ rio grand cutthroat trout, rio grand sucker, fathead minnow. [11] resid amphibian includ tiger salamander, choru frog, northern leopard frog, spadefoot, great plain toad, woodhouse' toad.[12] big spring creek uniqu spring-f creek fed unconfin aquifer, creat rare species- plant-support wetland gener arid area. creek design nation natur landmark 2012.[13] elk big spring creek great sand dune nation park access[edit] get dune requir walk across wide shallow medano creek, flow spring earli summer. hike permitted, warn sand get hot summer, 140&#160;°f (60&#160;°c). area get snow winter. sand wheelchair avail visitor' center. closest citi alamosa, though canon city, pueblo, colorado springs, denver albuquerque, new mexico within hours' drive. u.s. post offic alamosa (zip code 81101) serv nation park.[14] unlik nation park lower 48 states, great sand dune nation park equip preserv allow hunting; preserv design absent lower 48. sport hunting, allow preserve, equip mani regulations, avail park' website; regul law includ pursu wound anim enter park hunt insid nation park boundaries. bow-hunt common preserve, ptarmigan frequent target bow-hunters. mountain lion hunt dog also allow preserve, unless dog spot lion pursu it, requir leashed.[15] park history[edit] dune — 750 feet (230&#160;m) tall — base sangr de cristo range. dune surround area design nation monument 1932. novemb 22, 2000, unit state presid bill clinton sign great sand dune nation park preserv act 2000, aim ultim nation park status. help natur conservancy, feder govern purchas 97,000 acr (39,000&#160;ha) baca ranch, effect tripl size park. purchas includ section ranch previous border park north west side also includ 14,165-foot (4,317&#160;m) kit carson mountain 14,080-foot (4,292&#160;m) subpeak challeng point, water drainag south. land purchas split three sections. part sangr de cristo mountain would transfer rio grand nation forest, anoth section west would set asid wildlif area would host wild bison herd last section east would transfer rio grand nation forest would open hunting. references[edit] ^ b "list acreag decemb 31, 2011". land resourc division, nation park service. retriev 2012-03-07.&#160;
